description:
A member of the Martian private security firm CGS. Calm and collected, with a head for the big picture, he`s undyingly loyal to his friends. The most experienced mobile weapon operator in CGS, he is assigned to pilot the Gundam Barbatos.
2nd season:A boy who belongs to Tekkadan. During a previous battle with Gjallarhorn, he overused the Alaya-Vijnana system, and consequently he has lost all sensation in his right eye and hand. However, these sensations can be restored by connecting to the Alaya-Vijnana system, and so he has continued fighting as the pilot of the Gundam Barbatos Lupus.
Source: en.gundam.info
name: Mikazuki Augus
